name: Interface WhileLoopTree
text:
A tree node for a 'while' loop statement.

 For example:
 
   while ( condition )
     statement
codes:
@Deprecated(since="11",
            forRemoval=true)
public interface WhileLoopTree
extends ConditionalLoopTree

methods.description: The condition expression of this 'while' statement.
The statement contained in this 'while' statement.
